messages.message: Thank you, I appreciate it and so is yours
Experience is diverse. Format needs work.
I'm starting a security job a Charles Schwab. How do you like London?

A legend, a pioneer that shaped history of Industry as we know it today. A talent beyond our time, I hope his spirit endures. 
London is an amazing wonderful city. I would love to feel that London is a "Drunken Harlot" that just takes you in her arms and wraps you around and never lets go until it fulfills every desire you have. I just can resist her charm.
I forgot to congratulate you on your new role and I meant to say great choice. I hear you guys in Scottsdale have the most exquisite scenery in the world, definitely a destination on my bucketlist.
Yes. Come visit. We Airbnb. Arizona has amazing scenery, the summers are awful though.
Thank you Brian that is so kind of you, let me know when you are in town. Love to meet up with like minded people.
